BODY.HEADLINE: India favours release of Suu Kyi

TEXT.POST:
sagar <enkaysa...@gmail.com> 2007-10-08T04:36:16 http://www.nowpublic.com/politics/india-favours-release-suu-kyi Prime Minister of India, Dr. Manmohan Singh has told the Philippines President Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo that India favours an early release of pro-democracy leader Aung San Suu Kyi and desires a fast return to peace in Burma.
"The release of Aung San Suu Kyi would be helpful in termsof the process of democratisation of Burma," Prime Minister Singh told the visiting President of Philippines while dwellingon the on going crisis in Burma.
